name: Royal Razzle
description:
Royal Razzle

Embark on a sugary quest with Royal Razzle, the latest addition to the world of hyper-casual gaming brought to you by Radioactive Bullfrog Entertainment!

Join Princess Sammi-chan in the magical kingdom filled with colorful candies. Your goal is to match and collect as many sweets as you can, while helping the Princess on her journey home to the castle. With its endearing and cheerful graphics, Royal Razzle is guaranteed to put a smile on your face.

This tile-matching adventure features a hundred levels, each designed to challenge your matching skills and provide hours of entertainment. Whether you're a fan of casual games or just looking for a fun and easy way to pass the time, Royal Razzle is the perfect choice for you.

With its intuitive gameplay, charming character, and addictive puzzle mechanics, Royal Razzle is an experience that will keep you craving for more. So ready your sweet tooth and join the Royal Razzle community, where sweet victory and endless fun await!
